definitions.definition: The action of one who abides ; the state of an abider .

definitions.dating_raw: First attested from around (1350 to 1470) until the early 17th century.

main_definition: The action of one who abides ; the state of an abider . [First attested from around 1150 to 1350.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) An abode. [First attested from around (1350 to 1470) until the early 17th century.]
